document.discussion_title: Yay or Nay? Oreo makes a new flavor: Swedish Fish Oreo | WWLP.com
document.topic_text: Oreo (WTNH)– Have you ever thought of what Swedish Fish candy and Oreo’s would taste like together? When the candy was first circulating on social media, many people thought it was a hoax until being confirmed. A representative from Oreo confirmed that the merger is the real deal and can be found only in Kroger grocery stores, but no need to worry, you can also buy them online on eBay . People have taken to social media to discuss the new creation:
